change_summary.what_changed: Download option for Windows has been replaced with a download option for Linux
specific_changes: Download for Windows replaced with Download for Linux
Added link to view all download options

market_signals: Windsurf may be expanding its support for different operating systems
strategic_analysis.business_impact: The change may slightly impact user experience, but it is unlikely to have a significant impact on the business
strategic_analysis.strategic_direction: Windsurf may be focusing on improving user experience and supporting a wider range of operating systems
strategic_analysis.competitive_implications: The change is unlikely to give Windsurf a significant competitive advantage

threats: The change may cause some users to experience minor inconvenience
key_findings: Windsurf has updated its download options to include a link to view all download options
opportunities: Windsurf may be able to attract more users by supporting a wider range of operating systems
recommended_actions: Monitor user feedback to ensure the change has not caused any significant issues
